This report describes maternal mortality in 
health facilities only. Additional analyses that 
include maternal deaths in the community are 
presented in the SMGL report on Maternal Mortality.
SMGL-supported staff enhanced the ability 
of districts in Uganda and Zambia to conduct 
maternal death audits and reviews by
  Training health staff to identify maternal 
deaths in facilities.
